name: AiDUO sprl.
goal: EU Public Affaits Consultancy providing support to client in the fields of EU environmental policies (focus on Chemicals related Legislation) and health care / Pharma
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Single market, Trade

Lobbying and communication support for clients towards the European Parliament and the European Commission.

Energy label, RoHS2, REACH, Animal Testing, Pharmaceuticals in the Environment, Water Framework Directive
